title: The Orphan's Curse
description: Nisha is an opinionated professional young woman and she knows what she wants in a man. Her mother takes her to Dhaka to meet potential candidates and she turns down Shoaib, a reserved doctor who shows no interest in her. She meets Tariq who is gorgeous, charming and everything she wants in a husband, but will her arranged marriage work? She faces bad news about her Dad's health on her return to the UK and their wedding is brought forward. Events take an unexpected turn and Shoaib is thrust back into her life, forcing her to face her flaws. Tragedy strikes again and secrets from her past are revealed. Was she wrong about Shoaib? She discovers he is tormented by his childhood and a curse which has followed him from his mother's womb. Is he her true love and what is preventing him from accepting her? They part ways again only to be finally brought together by their destinies which were entwined from the moment they met.
author: Aysha Syeda
